channel.title: Sustain on OK Commit
channel.description: Recent content in Sustain on OK Commit

item.title: How to Sustain OKC
item.description: While OKC principles seem simple, sustaining the process is harder than you think. Organizations implementing OKC will run into three issues: The novelty wears off in about 8 to 10 weeks. Team members will lose interest without reinforcement. The internal or external conditions may change. New opportunities or threats emerge that may impact an objective. The teamâ€™s assumption and predictions were wrong for their objective and key results. With OKC, you are making both strategic and execution bets.
